Dating: CHRISTIAN PERIOD (not before); CHRISTIAN PERIOD; ISLAMIC PERIOD (not after)
Name: Bowl
Description: Bowl with a wide mouth, a rounded rim with moulding on the exterior and a body with not very noticeable curvature in the middle of the body. The ring-shaped base has a foot and the paste is reddish in colour. On the inside, in the bottom, there is an impressed decoration consisting of radial lines.
